articles.author: Trends Desk
articles.title: Perplexity CEO says his AI browser will replace these two white collar jobs in every company - The Indian Express
articles.description: Perplexit CEO Aravind Srinivas highlighted how Comet could take over many routine duties of these two important roles in any organisation.
articles.content: Aravind Srinivas, CEO of Nvidia-backed startup Perplexity, has unveiled ambitions for the companys latest product, an AI-powered browser named Comet. Speaking on a recent episode of The Verges Decode… [+1980 chars]
